content: **knitted vest in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked bottom up with moss-stitch rib garter stitch and v-neck sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #coffeeridgevest drops design pattern me-289 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour 51 double latte **buttons** drops buttons no 511 3-3-4-4-4-4 items **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 42 row in height with garter stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm 23 stitches in width and 36 row in height with moss-stitch rib on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
